ca.corefacility.gview.layout.feature
Class FeatureShapeRealizer

java.lang.Object
  ca.corefacility.gview.layout.feature.FeatureShapeRealizer
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractArrowShapeRealizer, FullBackboneShapeRealizer, HiddenShapeRealizer, NoArrowShapeRealizer
public abstract class FeatureShapeRealizer
extends java.lang.Object

Deals with defining the actual shape representing a feature. Used to add different decorations (arrow heads) etc on features.

Author:
Aaron Petkau

Field Summary
static FeatureShapeRealizer CLOCKWISE_ARROW
          Draws features with the first type of arrow head, in the forward direction.
static FeatureShapeRealizer CLOCKWISE_ARROW2
          Draws features with another type of arrow head (looks more like a standard arrow) in the forward direction.
static FeatureShapeRealizer COUNTERCLOCKWISE_ARROW
          Draws features with the first type of arrow head, in the reverse direction.
static FeatureShapeRealizer COUNTERCLOCKWISE_ARROW2
          Draws features with another type of arrow head (looks more like a standard arrow) in the reverse direction.
static FeatureShapeRealizer HIDDEN
          Does not create any shape for a feature, so that it is hidden.
static FeatureShapeRealizer NO_ARROW
          Draws features with no arrow head.

Method Detail

createFeaturePrototype

public java.awt.Shape createFeaturePrototype(LocationConverter locationConverter,
                                             SlotPath path,
                                             Location location,
                                             double thickness,
                                             double heightAdjust)
Creates a shape in the passed slot, at the passed location.

Parameters:
path - The SlotPath where we should create the shape (this is modified).
location - The location to create the shape.
thickness - The thickness of the feature in the slot.
heightAdjust - The offset from the center of the feature in the slot.
Returns:
The shape of the feature on the map.

extractStart

protected int extractStart(Location location)
Returns the very start of this location

Parameters:
location - A contiguous location to pull the start from (location.isContiguous() must be true)
Returns:
The start of this location, or -1 if error.

extractStop

protected int extractStop(Location location)
Returns the very stop of this location

Parameters:
location - A contiguous location to pull the stop from (location.isContiguous() must be true)
Returns:
The stop of this location, or -1 if error.

extractMinMaxLength

protected int extractMinMaxLength(Location location,
                                  int sequenceLength)
Returns the length of a location, this may overlap the 0 base (circular)

Parameters:
location - A location to extract the length from.
sequenceLength -
Returns:
The length, or -1 if error.

findCenterBase

protected float findCenterBase(int start,
                               int stop,
                               int sequenceLength)

createStandardBlock

protected void createStandardBlock(SlotPath path,
                                   int start,
                                   int stop,
                                   double top,
                                   double bottom)
This creates a standard block (no decoration) in the slot. Used so that all implementations can have access to a method to do this.

Parameters:
path - The SlotPath where we should create the shape (this is modified).
start - The start base of this block.
stop - The end base of this block.
top - The top of this block (in the slot).
bottom - The bottom of this block (in the slot).

realizeFeatureShape

protected abstract java.awt.Shape realizeFeatureShape(SlotPath path,
                                                      Location trueLocation,
                                                      double top,
                                                      double bottom,
                                                      int sequenceLength)
Method to override to do the actual drawing. Parameters already checked for errors.

Parameters:
path - The SlotPath where we should create the shape (this is modified).
trueLocation - The actual location if the feature on the sequence.
top - The top of this block (in the slot).
bottom - The bottom of this block (in the slot).
